LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicInsanityLance.label: psychic insanity lance
LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicInsanityLance.description: A limited-use psychic effector. It overwhelms the target's mind with terrifying perceptual distortions, driving him into a berserk state. There is a risk of brain damage. It has a long range, but requires line of sight.
LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicShockLance.label: psychic shock lance
LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicShockLance.description: A limited-use psychic effector. It shocks the target's mind with chaotic images, blocking coherent perception and dropping him into a state of psychic shock. There is a risk of brain damage. It has a long range, but requires line of sight.
